Professional Strategy

DXH803, 2016, Semester 2

I'm a Digital Problem-Solver.

If there is a goal to achieve, I'll work out how. I'm able to put my own opinions aside and instead reach into the user's mindset and consider every element of their experience, from their motivations to their frustrations. With a research and analytics based mindset, I back up every decision I make with evidence and data. I'm willing to consider absolutely everything - even the smallest detail could make the largest change.
